item.title: WLFI Treasury minted an additional 205 million USD1 to the WLFI Treasury this morning.
item.description: On August 21st, according to official information, WLFI added a minting amount of 2.05 billion USD to the WLFI Treasury this morning.

item.title: Singapore's DBS Bank Launches Tokenized Structured Note on Ethereum
item.description: On August 21st, DBS, Singapore's largest bank, announced the issuance of tokenized structured notes on the Ethereum public chain. The notes are targeted at qualified and institutional investors on Singapore local exchanges such as ADDX, DigiFT, and HydraX. The first product is a participation note linked to cryptocurrency. It settles in cash when prices rise and limits losses when prices fall. The note unit has been reduced from the traditional $100,000 to $1,000, enhancing liquidity and trading convenience.It is reported that the trading volume of related products exceeded $1 billion in the first half of 2025, with a nearly 60% quarter-on-quarter growth in Q2. DBS will subsequently expand to stocks and credit-linked notes. (CoinDesk)

item.title: LookOnChain: SOL briefly touched $190
item.description: On August 21st, according to HTX market data, SOL briefly reached $190 and is currently trading at $189.05.

item.title: iOS Release Important Security Patch, Fixing Exploited Zero-Day Vulnerability
item.description: On August 21st, as per official channels, iOS has rolled out a crucial security patch version 18.6.2.According to the analysis by security expert Ryan Naraine, this version is set to address a zero-day vulnerability that has been actively exploited.

item.title: LookOnChain: Gate Alpha Launches YZY
item.description: August 21st. As per official information, Gate Alpha has launched Kanye West's YZY globally.It is reported that YZY is a meme coin put out by the renowned rapper Kanye West. He tweeted on his official account today, stating "YEEZY MONEY is here, a brand new economic system constructed on the blockchain," and released the token contract address.

item.title: Hyperliquid launches YZY/USDC perpetual contract, supporting up to 3x leverage.
item.description: On August 21st, according to official channels, Hyperliquid has initiated the YZY/USDC perpetual contract, which is capable of supporting a leverage of up to 3 times.

item.title: MEXC Lists YZY and Launches Zero Fee Contract Trading Activity
item.description: August 21st. According to official information, the MEXC spot market has listed YZYUSDT and simultaneously initiated the YZYUSDT perpetual contract. Additionally, a contract zero fee event has been introduced.

item.title: Meteora's Largest YZY Liquidity Pool Has Generated $8.15M in Fees
item.description: On August 21, based on the relevant page information, the TVL (Total Value Locked) of the largest liquidity pool of YZY on Meteora is currently reported to be $202 million, with 48.2 million USDC. At the moment of writing, this LP pool has generated $8.15 million in fees.

item.title: Yi Li Hua: As the September rate cut approaches, unless there is a major issue in the US stock market, it will be a bullish trend opportunity for upward trading
item.description: August 21st. Yihan Li, the founder of Liquid Capital (formerly LD Capital), stated in a post on the X Platform: "Due to the impact of the U.S. financial holiday in August, it has always been a trading off-season. Historically, the performance of cryptocurrencies during this time has not been good. Coupled with Chairman Powell's upcoming speech and the decline in the U.S. stock market, ETH has performed exceptionally well, providing a great opportunity and region for everyone to buy the dip. With the 25 basis point rate cut in September approaching, unless there is a major issue with the U.S. stock market in the future, it will be a bullish trend with trading opportunities on the rise.""From a macro perspective, the key focuses are U.S. stock market risks, crypto policies, the confrontation between Trump and the Federal Reserve and stablecoins, industry attention on the next ETF, DeFi regulations, token projects, etc."

item.title: Coinbase Executive: At Least 94% of YZY Tokens Held by Insiders
item.description: On August 21st, Conor Grogan, an executive at Coinbase, stated on social media, "According to my estimations, at least 94% of the YZY tokens are held by insiders; 87% of the tokens are held by a single multisig wallet (which has now been diversified into multiple wallets); more than 3% of the tokens were acquired at the market opening by multiple (pre-prepared) wallets through a single large transaction; and more than 7% of the tokens are in a liquidity pool."
